article: the top u.n. official in afghanistan said friday he will not renew his contract when it expires in march after a two-year tenure marred by controversy over his handling of the country 's fraud-marred presidential election and a deadly attack on u.n. workers .
abstract: top un official in afghanistan wants to leave
